title: Terraâ€™s Do Kwon Seeks Trial Delay, Citing Extradition Holdup
description: Terraform Labs co-founder Do Kwon has requested that the judge in his fraud case delay the trial date, currently set for Jan. 29, 2024, because Kwon is still tied up in extradition proceedings in Montenegro. Terra’s Do Kwon Requests Trial Postponement Due to Extradition Issues In a letter to U.S. District Judge Jed Rakoff dated […]

title: Ripple Labs Plans $285 Million Share Repurchase In Response To Market Dynamics
description: Ripple Labs has unveiled its intention to conduct a share repurchase, or tender offer, valued at $285 million, targeting initial investors and staff members. This move places the company’s valuation at an impressive $11.3 billion. According to sources from Reuters, participants in this tender offer are restricted to selling a […]
